content: Karl Lagerfeld era originale, ed era riconoscibile soprattutto per via dei suoi capelli bianchi, occhiali da vista neri, colletti inamidati e guanti neri senza dita.
translations: eng:Karl Lagerfeld was an original, and was recognizable chiefly because of his white hair, black eyeglasses, starched colla
